Pre-Game Insights: Miles Mikolas has been surprisingly better on the road than at home where he is 7-5 with a 4.65 ERA and 1.28 WHIP.
Yariel Rodriguez has been much better at home despite his 0-2 record with a 3.64 ERA and 1.21 WHIP.
Paul Goldschmidt leads the Cardinals with 21 home runs and consistent production.
Masyn Winn and Alec Burleson have been providing a spark to the Cardinals lineup, contributing 73 RBIs and 21 home runs this season.
Yariel Rodriguez showed potential in his recent outing against Atlanta, pitching six innings giving up one run on two hits with six strikeouts.
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. is batting.321 with 28 home runs and 94 RBIs.
The Blue Jays' offense has been heating up lately, scoring at least six runs in 10 of their last 14 games.
The Blue Jays have a 36-37 record at Rogers Centre, suggesting a home-field advantage.
